inlineContent.text: We build the average of your last 2 months total revenue reported to App Store Connect across all apps. If you exceed your current plan, you no longer will be able to update the paywall remote configuration, you won‚Äôt see the purchase stats, nor will you receive purchase notifications. But your app will continue to show your last paywall and purchases will continue to work in your apps.
Income on App Store Connect can vary significantly, that‚Äôs why we‚Äôve build a flexible and fair system for you:
Your monthly income is calculated by building the
average of your last 2 months‚Äô total revenue
. This ensures that (1) you don‚Äôt have to upgrade if you exceeded just for one month and (2) you can downgrade quickly again when your business takes an unexpected dip.

If you exceed your current plan, you don‚Äôt need to worry, nothing bad will happen. Everything in your app will continue to work as expected, including the paywalls and your last remote configuration and purchases. But you won‚Äôt be able to edit anything or see any data in FreemiumKit. So you will lose access to the paywall editor to adjust your paywall remotely or change A/B testing settings. You also won‚Äôt be able to change your pricing through FreemiumKit or receive push notifications for live purchase stats. And you won‚Äôt see your purchase history stats.
to work. Currently, there‚Äôs no payment at all and FreemiumKit is free to use for everyone. If you have any doubts about this system, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact me, I might adjust things as needed.
Have questions or need support? Reach out to me at
Privacy: No personal data is tracked on this site.
